data.caption: Unaudited Standalone And Consolidated Financial Results For The Quarter Ended June 30, 2023.
data.news_body: Pursuant to Reg. 33 and Reg. 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirement) Regulations, 2015 we hereby submit the Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the Quarter Ended June 30, 2023.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On Monday, August 14, 2023.
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 and 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 this is to inform you that the Board of Directors ('the Board') of the Company at its meeting held on Monday, 14th August, 2023 at the Registered Office of the Company inter-alia considered and approved the following matters:
1. Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the 1st Quarter ended 30th June, 2023 along with Limited Review Reports issued by Statutory Auditors. 2. Appointment of Secretarial Auditor of the Company to conduct a Secretarial Audit for the Financial Year 2023-24. 3. Draft Director's Report along with Annexures of the Company for the Financial Year ended 31st March, 2023......................

The meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company commenced at 04.30 p.m. and concluded at 06.00 p.m.

data.caption: Resubmission Of Audited Financial Results For The Quarter And Year Ended 31St March, 2023.
data.news_body: Pursuant to Reg.30 and Reg.33 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 we hereby resubmitting the Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the Quarter and Year Ended 31st March, 2023.

data.caption: Resubmission Of Audited Financial Results For The Quarter And Year Ended 31St March, 2023.
data.news_body: Pursuant to Reg.30 and Reg.33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we hereby inform that the Board of Directors at its meeting held on Saturday, 5th August, 2023 has inter-alia, approved the resubmission of Audited Financial Statement (Standalone and Consolidated) for the Quarter and Year Ended 31st March, 2023.

data.caption: Audited Financial Results Of Q4 & Year Ended March 31, 2023
data.news_body: Pursuant to Reg. 33 and Reg. 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirement) Regulations, 2015 we hereby submit the Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Statements for the Quarter and Year Ended March 31, 2023.

data.caption: Financial Results For Quarter And Nine Months Ended On December 31, 2022
data.news_body:
Pursuant to regulations 30 and 33 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirement) Regulations, 2015 the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on Saturday, 28th January, 2023 at 4.30 p.m. at the registered office of the Company inter alia considered, approved and taken on record the following: 1. Unaudited Standalone Financial Statements of the Company for the Quarter and Nine Months ended on December 31, 2022 and Limited Review Report by the Statutory Auditors of the Company. 2. Unaudited Consolidated Financial Statements of the Company for the Quarter and Nine Months ended on December 31, 2022 and Limited Review Report by the Statutory Auditors of the Company.
The Board meeting commenced at 4.30 P.M. and concluded at 6.15 P.M.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Meeting Of Board Of Directors Held On Saturday, January 28, 2023.
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 read with Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirement) Regulations, 2015 the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on Saturday, 28th January, 2023 at 4.30 p.m. at the registered office of the Company inter alia considered, approved and taken on record the following agenda: 1. Approval of the Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the Quarter and Nine Months ended December 31, 2022 along with Statements of Assets and Liabilities and Statement of Cash Flow which have been duly reviewed and recommended by the Audit Committee; 2. Limited Review Reports of the Statutory Auditors of the Company on the Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the Quarter and Nine Months ended on December 31, 2022...........
The Board meeting commenced at 4.30 P.M. and concluded at 6.15 P.M.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Meeting Of Board Of Directors Held On Friday, October 21, 2022.
data.news_body:
Pursuant to the Regulation 30 read with Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirement) Regulations, 2015 the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on Friday, 21st October, 2022 at 4.30 p.m. at the registered office of the Company inter alia considered, approved and taken on record the following agenda:
1. Approval of the Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the half year ended September 30, 2022 along with statements of Assets and Liabilities and statement of Cash Flow which have been duly reviewed and recommended by the Audit Committee;
2. Limited Review Reports of the Statutory Auditors of the Company on the Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the half year ended on September 30, 2022.

The meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company commenced at 04.30 p.m. and concluded at 05.30 p.m.

data.caption: Resubmission Of Audited Consolidated Financial Results For The Year Ended March 31, 2022.
data.news_body: Pursuant to an email received from BSE Limited dated 24th May, 2022 we hereby submit the revised Audited Consolidated Financial Statement for the year ended on March 31, 2022.

data.caption: Audited Standalone And Consolidated Financial Result For The Half Year And Year Ended March 31, 2022.
data.news_body: Pursuant to Reg. 33 and Reg. 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirement) Regulations, 2015 we hereby submit the Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Statements for the Half Year and Year Ended March 31, 2022.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Meeting Of Board Of Directors Held On Friday, May 6, 2022.
data.news_body:
Pursuant to the Reg. 33 and Reg. 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we hereby inform that the Board of Directors at its meeting held on Friday, 6th May, 2022 at 4.30 p.m. at the registered office of the Company inter alia considered, approved and taken on record the following agenda:

1. Approval of the Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the Half Year and Year ended March 31, 2022, pursuant to Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 along with statements of Assets and Liabilities which have been duly reviewed and recommended by the Audit Committee;

2. Approval for the investment in Capital Contribution of the proposed Limited Liability Partnership Firm to be incorporate in the name and style of 'Suratwwala Natural Energy Resource LLP' or under any other name as may be approved by the Central Registration Centre (CRC), Ministry of Corporate Affairs (MCA);

data.caption: Unaudited Financial Results Of The Company For The Quarter/Nine-Months Ended December 31, 2021.
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 and 33 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements), 2015 (''Listing Regulations''), we are enclosing herewith the following:

1. Unaudited Financial Statements of the Company for the quarter and nine months ended on December 31, 2021.
2. Statement of Assets and Liability for the nine months ended on December 31, 2021.
3. Cash Flow Statement for the nine months ended on December 31, 2021.
4. Limited Review Report on Unaudited Financial Results for the period ended on December 31, 2021 by the Statutory Auditors of the Company.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Under Regulation 30 Of SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 and 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 this to inform you that the Board of Directors in its meeting held today i.e 21st January, 2022 has considered and approved the following:

1. Unaudited Financial Result along with the Statement of Asset & Liability and Statement of Cash Flow for the quarter and nine months ended on December 31, 2021.

2. Limited Review Reports of the Statutory Auditors of the Company on the Unaudited Financial Results for the period ended on December 31, 2021.

data.news_body: Outcome of Board Meeting pursuant to Regulation 30 and Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we hereby inform that the Board of Directors at its meeting held on Friday, October 29, 2021

data.caption: Resubmission Of Audited Standalone Financial Results For The Half Year Ended And Year Ended On March 31, 2021.
data.news_body: Pursuant to an email received from BSE Limited dated 14th July, 2021 we hereby submit the revised Audited Financial Statement for the half year ended and year ended on March 31, 2021.

data.caption: Corrigendum To Audited Financial Results For The Half Year Ended And Year Ended March 31,2021.
data.news_body:
With reference to captioned subject, we would like to inform you that Audited Financial Results of 'Suratwwala Business Group Limited' ('Company') for the half year ended and year ended March 31, 2021 were submitted to Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE) on June 23rd, 2021.

However, due to inadvertence in Statement of Assets & Liabilities as on March 31, 2021 the amount in Long Term Borrowings for 31st March, 2021 has been mentioned as Rs.2590.39 (in lakhs) instead of Rs. 2426.75 (in lakhs) and the amount in Short Term Provisions has been mentioned as Rs.234.87(in lakhs) instead of Rs.398.52 (in lakhs).

Herewith attaching the Financial Results along revised Statement of Assets & Liabilities and Cash Flow Statement as on March 31, 2021.

We further wish to inform you that the said corrections has no material impact over the Audited Financial submitted for the half year ended and year ended March 31, 2021.

Kindly take this for your information and record please.

data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting Dated June 23, 2021 - Audited Financial Results For The Half Year And Year Ended March 31, 2021
data.news_body:
With reference to above subject and in compliance with the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we hereby submit the outcome of the Meeting of Board of Director held on today i.e. 23 June, 2021 at 03:30 p.m. and concluded on 5:30 p.m.:-
1. Considered, adopted and approved Audited Financial Results for the half year and year ended on 31st March, 2021 along with the Auditor''s Report and Certificate for Unmodified opinion pursuant to regulation 33 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015.
